attributes.action: For the king to dissolve parliament and call an immediate ageneral election
attributes.background: labour have blatantly and willingly lied to the public in its manifesto it was was elected on. The right and fair thing to do is to call a new General election  and restore faith in its people and country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
